guild_card.setup_detail: You must set a username and profile picture before being able to complete quests. The username and profile picture must be unique and readable.
guild_card.setup_warning: Duplicates accounts will lose their airdrop badge.

blocked_country_info.geo_blocking_info: Unfortunately you as citizen of one of the following [ USA, CHINA, NORTH KOREA, IRAN, SYRIA, CUBA, VENEZUELA, FRANCE, UAE ] nations, not allowed to participate in this token launch sale.
